entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
